remarks: If the sum of two squares is prime, the two original numbers are coprime (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Feb-2020.)
statement:
2sqcoprm.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
2sqcoprm.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ZZ ) $.
2sqcoprm.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ZZ ) $.
2sqcoprm.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( A ^ 2 ) + ( B ^ 2 ) ) = P ) $.
2sqcoprm $p |- ( ph -> ( A gcd B ) = 1 ) $.
